course_description: The first part of the course introduces the logic of experimentation and discusses various methodological issues in the design and analysis of experiments. The second part builds on this foundation to discuss some practical issues and ethical considerations in designing and implementing experiments.
sections: Class Nbr: 5943, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 10-11:15a, Instructor: N. Bueno, Status: Open
